WorkItem.Description:
If I load my characters from the EU armory and subsequently try to reload them via Character Profiler they cannot be found which seems to be due to Rawr is looking for them on a US realm.
Â 
It doesn't seem to help if I select a US realm from the drop-down box on the character stats panel.
WorkItem.Summary: Reload from Character Profiler defaults to US realms

Comments.Message: ...huh? Character Profiler doesn't "look" for any character, it's all in the CharacterProfiler.lua. I can see it setting your region to US after the fact, since CharacterProfiler.lua may not contain the region, but that doesn't stop it from loading.

It says character not found. Manually loading it from armory or completely loading from characterprofiler (not reloading) and everything is fine.

I attached my characterprofiler-file with some characters. Try to load Krendar/Terenas-EU from armory and then reload from the character-profiler data and its not being found (despite being there).
Ah sorry found the error now. Seems you have to be careful writing your character name with uppercase first letter.
